articles.title: Masters as it happened: Smith tied second as Johnson takes major No.2 - The Age
articles.description: Cameron Smith has finished second despite a record-breaking campaign at Augusta with US world No.1 Dustin Johnson the newest Masters champion.
articles.content:
And that's where we'll leave it this morning. Congratulations to Dustin Johnson, and of course Cameron Smith, both of whom I'm sure we'll be seeing on plenty of major Mondays going forward.
